text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae aoy khnhom yk anak keapear krawpi a l laoh del chea anak bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei ning chea anak bratan ahar haey trong min trauvkar ke bratan ahar aoy ryy? chaur anak pol tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom trauv ban ke( a l laoh) banhchea aoy klaytowchea anak kansasanea ai sla m mounke haey chaur anak kom klay khluon knongchamnaom puok mou sh ri ki n aoy saoh
